# Explaination of Package

This package includes many labs, assignments, and projects that are part of a course focused on applied statistics. It also contains many functions that are used in these labs, assignments, and functions.

## mybin

This is a function that allows the uses of the binomial model in a more specific way.



## myfun

This is a simple funiton that I had to make in order it show that I could make one.




## myncurve

This function shows the curve of the normal distribution.




## myplot

This function shows data points.



## ntickets

This function is for one of the projects about optimal ticket sales for an airline.
